definition: state/country/the Gods of earth and grain
society/group/club/agency/(old) god of the land
millet/God of cereals worshiped by ancient rulers/minister of agriculture
(of states within the nation) to support the ruler in governing the country

sentences.english: Lee Ji-life unrealized Sea, the state-an ambitious goals.
sentences.chinese: 李氏一生未实现济苍海，安社稷的宏大理想。

sentences.english: You say, for the nation, the motherland, I need to make a sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 你说，为了国家社稷，祖国河山，我需要作出牺牲。
